mapper.select: SELECT t.app_id appId, IFNULL(SUM(t.request_amount),0) AS requestAmount, t1.`app_id` realAppId, t1.`adx_id`, t1.`app_name`, t1.`app_type`, t1.`pkg_name` FROM pap_t_appflow_hour t left join pap_t_app t1 on t1.id = t.`app_id` WHERE t.datetime BETWEEN #{beginTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t.app_id ORDER BY request_amount DESC LIMIT #{limitNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}
